long_description: With a wrap-around design and soft PVC-free foam, the Stohlquist Nemo PFD will enhance your child's safety and comfort this summer. Padded head support has an additional foam band for increased security; design helps child naturally float face up. Large grab handle makes it easy to retrieve a child out of the water. Easy-to-use front zipper and nylon crotch and waist straps with side-release buckles secure PFD comfortably, preventing ride-up. Durable 200-denier nylon oxford stands up to the rigors of paddling. Stohlquist Nemo PFD features a weight range of 30 - 50 lbs.
short_description: With a wrap-around design and soft PVC-free foam, the Stohlquist Nemo PFD will enhance your child's safety and comfort this summer.
